name: Significant Other(s)
description:
How long can you lead this life until someone finds out? How long can you delay the inevitable? Navigate all your partners through the city using crossroad directions and satisfy their needs. Beware! No two partners of the same color can meet, otherwise you're in big trouble.

Instructions:

  • click on the white crossroads to direct people

  • partners with the same color know each other - make sure they never meet

  • go on dates with partners by directing them to the place of their choice.

  • hover over them to see where they want to go.

  • drag to move the camera and scroll to zoom it.

Note: This game is not meant to be a poly* lifestyle criticism.

Original soundtrack & art, city tileset, other tiles 1, other tiles 2 and font reused. This game was made for Ludum Dare 50 and is open-source.
